sentences.en: A new chapter is included in the second edition.
sentences.cn: 这本书再版时插入了新的一章.

sentences.en: And there we end this edition of Science in Action.
sentences.cn: 本期《科学在行动》到这里就结束了。

sentences.en: I enjoy the omnibus edition of Eastenders on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢看《伦敦东区》的周日连播版。

sentences.en: I'm correcting the proofs of the Spanish edition right now.
sentences.cn: 我正在校正西班牙语版本的校样。

sentences.en: Many new words and phrases have been included in the revised edition.
sentences.cn: 修订版收入许多新词语.

sentences.en: Martin was reading the early edition of the Evening News.
sentences.cn: 马丁在看《新闻晚报》的早间版

sentences.en: The edition is confined to 5 , 000 copies.
The edition is limited to 10000 copies priced twelve dollars.
sentences.cn: 这个版本限出10000册,价格为12美元.

sentences.en: The French edition came out in early 1992.
The last edition of this newspaper goes to press at 6 p.m.
sentences.cn: 该报的最后一版下午六点钟付印.

sentences.en: The new edition embodies many improvements.
sentences.cn: 新版本有许多改进之处.

sentences.en: The revised edition is to all intents and purposes a new book.
sentences.cn: 修订本实际上是一本新书.

sentences.en: The textbook was first published in 1858 and is now in its 39th edition.
sentences.cn: 该课本初版于1858年，现在已经是第39版了。

sentences.en: the US edition of Marie Claire magazine
They appeared on an edition of BBC2's Arena.
sentences.cn: 他们在英国广播公司二台《竞技场》的一期节目中亮相。

sentences.en: This a facsimile edition of an eighteenth century book.
sentences.cn: 这是一本18世纪书籍的复制版.

sentences.en: This is a pilot edition of a new language course.
sentences.cn: 这是一种新语言教程的试用版.

phrases.tran_cn: 发行额有限的限定版（通常为装订精美者）

trans.tran_en: the form that a book, newspaper, magazine etc is produced in
